Feed Name 2013-07-20T09:54:17 http://domain/ Author Email http://domain//2013/07/20/howthisblogwascreated.md.html How this blog site was created 2013-07-20T00:00:00 Author http://domain/ Here's how I did it. http://domain//2013/07/17/firstpost.html first post! 2013-07-17T00:00:00 Author http://domain/ <p>Well, after much experimentation with several options I have finally settled on a blog platform that is satisfying all my criteria. Basically, I wanted something that:</p> <ul> <li>I could have full control of the template</li> <li>The blog posts were in a simple format</li> <li>Blog posts were under some form of source control</li> <li>Could be hosted anywhere</li> <li>Had an easy development cycle</li> </ul> <p>The result is this blog site which I think ticks the above boxes without much compromise. </p> <p>I shall post again with the technical details.</p>
